lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: LOCKE!!!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: KEYNA!!!

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: LOCKE!!!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Okay, why are we yelling so early in the morning?

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: Don't play dumb, you know exactly why I'm here!

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: This is serious, Locke!

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: I woke up this morning, and my key was gone, and I blame YOU.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Wha?! But it's right there around your neck like it always is!

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: This is a spare, how would I be able to leave my house otherwise?!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Okay that makes sense, but why would I steal your key?

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: Well it certainly wouldn't be the first time.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Haha, okay in fairness, I didn't know that it was your house key.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I thought it would open a secret safe or chest or something. Or a closet with a hidden entrance to-

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: In the amount of time that you were trying my key on who knows what, I was locked out!

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: I didn't have a spare key back then! I must have lost out on who knows how many clients!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Well I assure you it wasn't me this time.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: It would be unprofessional of me to use the same prank twice.

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: Well if it isn't you, then I'm at a lost...

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: (Hold on, this might be a good chance for me to get close to the enemy.)

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: (Let's try this...)

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Do... you want me to help you find the key?

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: That's... awfully nice of you to offer.

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: What's the catch.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: No catch!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: It's just... dangerous to leave a house key missing, y'know?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I would feel bad even if it WAS my arch nemesis that got locked out.

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: ...Well I certainly can't refuse to any help right now.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Anyways, are you sure you didn't just leave your key under those stack of papers on your desk?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Honestly, that desk is as messy as mines, and probably the last place you would try to look.

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: I-It's true I haven't checked my desk yet...

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Because you didn't want to think about all the work you have piling up right?

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: W-why do you know this?!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: How do you think I stole your key the first time?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Alright, I'm free today so I can come over and help you clean up.

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: It's fine! I don't need that much help.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Seriously? Last time you were dragging my arm off in need of help with couple counseling.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: (That actually ended up being pretty fun.)

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: (Keyna was surprisingly earnest with her advice. She wasn't as snobby as I thought she would be.)

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Come on, let's go clean your office.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: TARGET: OASCI. Commencing CLEANING SEQUENCE: FULL DIVE. START!

lines.name: Keyna
lines.text: Why are you the one pulling my arm now?!
